Plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.
Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Writer: Anne Fine (novel), Randi Mayem Singer (screenplay), Leslie Dixon (screenplay)
Actors: Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein
tomatoConsensus: On paper, Mrs. Doubtfire might seem excessively broad or sentimental, but Robin Williams shines so brightly in the title role that the end result is difficult to resist.
